title: Could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR
body:
Hi, 

First thank you very much for developing DLC. It is a great tool. So far we have been using it with Google Colab but I would like to make the training in a Nvidia Quadro RTX 4000 with 8GB of RAM. 

I installed the last version from the .yaml files, which it says it is the Deeplabcut 2.0

To install the Nvidia Driver + CUDA I tried this:

https://github.com/DeepLabCut/Docker4DeepLabCut2.0/wiki/Installation-of-NVIDIA-driver-and-CUDA-10

and also this:

https://github.com/ykogr/misc/blob/master/210116_Installation_of_Deeplabcut_to_Ubuntu.md

I tried to install it from both my working Ubuntu partition, uninstalling nvidia and cuda and reinstalling them again following the instructions but also from a freshly Ubuntu installation. The result is always the same. I always get the convolution problem when I try to train a neural network. 

Any advice?

Below I attach what my system responds to the typical commands to retrieve Nvidia and CUDA information.


Thanks in advance. 

```
**gcc --version**
gcc (Ubuntu 7.5.0-3ubuntu1~18.04) 7.5.0
Copyright (C) 2017 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

**$ nvidia-smi**
Thu Apr 22 17:44:38 2021       
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 460.32.03    Driver Version: 460.32.03    CUDA Version: 11.2     |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name        Persistence-M| Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|                               |                      |               MIG M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  Quadro RTX 4000     Off  | 00000000:2D:00.0  On |                  N/A |
| 30%   39C    P8     8W / 125W |    390MiB /  7959MiB |      1%      Default |
|                               |                      |                  N/A |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
                                                                               
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes:                                                                  |
|  GPU   GI   CI        PID   Type   Process name                  GPU Memory |
|        ID   ID                                                   Usage      |
|=============================================================================|
|    0   N/A  N/A      1983      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell              117MiB |
|    0   N/A  N/A      2554      G   /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg                194MiB |
|    0   N/A  N/A      2711      G   /usr/bin/gnome-shell               59MiB |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+


**$ nvcc --version**
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2017 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Fri_Nov__3_21:07:56_CDT_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 9.1, V9.1.85
```

I tried as well the CUDA version 10.0.1.13 with the same result.
